item.title: Spritpreise: Price alarm now available
item.description:
Spritpreise has received a useful new feature â€“ the Price Alarm! Starting now, you can set a personal price threshold for your favorite gas stations. If the price for Super E5, E10, or Diesel drops below this value, you’ll automatically receive a push notification directly to your smartphone.

You’re on vacation or have recently filled up? No worries, pause the price alarm with one simple click for a few hours or days - until you need it again.
